```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}

for (filename in list.files('data')){
  print('----------------------------------------------------------')
  print(filename)
  dt <- fread(paste('data/',filename,sep=''))
  print(summary(dt))
}
```
